original_text: The water returned to its proper place. It covered all of Pharaoh's army that had followed the Israelites into the sea. It covered all the chariots, the horses and their riders. Not one of Pharaoh's soldiers was still alive!
korean_text: 물이 다시 흘러 병거들과 기병들을 덮되 그들의 뒤를 따라 바다에 들어간 바로의 군대를 다 덮으니 하나도 남지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: The water returned to its proper place.
It covered all of Pharaoh's army
that had followed the Israelites into the sea.
Not one of Pharaoh's soldiers was still alive!
sentences.korean_translation: 바로의 군사들 중 한 명도 살아있지 않았습니다!
